remarks: The Legendre symbol function ` X ( m ) = ( m /L N ) ` , where ` N ` is an odd positive number, is a real Dirichlet character modulo ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lgsdchr.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
lgsdchr.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
lgsdchr.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
lgsdchr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
lgsdchr.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
lgsdchr.x $e |- X = ( y e. B |-> ( iota h E. m e. ZZ ( y = ( L ` m ) /\ h = ( m /L N ) ) ) ) $.
lgsdchr $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ -. 2 || N ) -> ( X e. D /\ X : B --> RR ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d L h m y $.
$d N h m y $.
$d X y $.
$d Z y $.
$d h m y $.
